# VARIABLES

```{r variables}
# PROGRAMS
programs_dir <- file.path("", "home", "shared")
bedtools_dir <- file.path(programs_dir, "bedtools-2.31.1", "bin")
blast_dir <- file.path(programs_dir, "ncbi-blast-2.15.0+", "bin")
fastaFromBed <- file.path(bedtools_dir, "fastaFromBed")
samtools_dir <- file.path(programs_dir, "samtools-1.12")
samtools_faidx <- file.path(samtools_dir, "samtools faidx")

# FILES
count_matrix <- "../output/07-Apul-Hisat/Apul-gene_count_matrix.csv"
peptide_fasta <- "../data/Apulchra-genome.pep.faa"
peptide_fasta_index <- "../data/Apulchra-genome.pep.faa.fai"
peptide_subset_fasta <- "../output/30.00-Apul-transcriptome-GOslims/Apulchra-genome.pep-subset.faa"
og_transcripts_gtf <- "Apulchra-genome.gtf"
transcripts_fasta <- "Apulchra-transcripts.fasta"
transcripts_gtf <- "Apulchra-transcripts.gtf"
line <- "-----------------------------------------------"

# Export these as environment variables for bash chunks.
Sys.setenv(
  count_matrix = count_matrix,
  fastaFromBed = fastaFromBed,
  peptide_fasta = peptide_fasta,
  peptide_fasta_index = peptide_fasta_index,
  peptide_subset_fasta = peptide_subset_fasta,
  og_transcripts_gtf = og_transcripts_gtf,
  line = line,
  transcripts_fasta = transcripts_fasta,
  transcripts_gtf = transcripts_gtf
)
```

## Subset Expressed Genes

Only those with at least _one_ read in each sample

### Peek at count matrix

```{r check-count-matrix, engine=bash}
head "${count_matrix}" | column -t -s","

echo ""
echo ""

wc -l "${count_matrix}"
```

```{r check-peptide-FastA, engine=bash}
grep "^>" "${peptide_fasta}" | head

echo ""
echo ""

head "${peptide_fasta_index}"
```


```{r import-count-matrix}

# Read the data into a data frame
count_matrix_df <- read.csv(count_matrix, header = TRUE)

str(count_matrix_df)
```

NOTICE: `gene_id` does _not_ match the IDs in the peptide FastA. Need to deal with this.

```{r subset-count-matrix}
# Filter rows where all values are greater than 0
filtered_count_matrix_df <- count_matrix_df[apply(count_matrix_df > 0, 1, all), ]

# Print the row names (gene_ids) of the filtered data frame
str(filtered_count_matrix_df)
```

## Subset Peptides FastA

Only expressed genes

```{r subset-peptides-FastA}
# Get the row names (gene_ids) of the filtered data frame
filtered_gene_ids <- rownames(filtered_count_matrix_df)

# Construct the samtools faidx command
samtools_command <- paste(samtools_faidx, peptide_fasta, paste(filtered_gene_ids, collapse = " "), ">", peptide_subset_fasta)

cat(samtools_command, "\n")

# Execute the samtools command
system(samtools_command)
```

### Peek at peptide subset FastA
```{r check-peptide-subset-fasta, engine=bash}
head "${peptide_subset_fasta}"
```
